meanings.sent1: My atok used to tell me stories about our family history.
meanings.sent2: I am proud to carry on the traditions passed down from my atok.
meanings.sent3: When my atok starts sharing old tales, everyone gathers around to listen.
meanings.sent4: The wisdom of my atok is like a guiding light for our family.
meanings.sent5: The memories of my atok's laughter echo through our home.

meanings.definition: To be present in a particular place.
meanings.sent1: I will atok at the park for our picnic tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: Please make sure to atok at the meeting on time.
meanings.sent3: I always seem to atok at the most unexpected moments.
meanings.sent4: Her smile seemed to atok in my mind long after she left.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of peace seemed to atok in the room as we meditated.

meanings.definition: A unit of pressure equal to 101,325 pascals.
meanings.sent1: The tire pressure should be atok for a smooth ride.
meanings.sent2: Make sure the machine can handle the atok before starting it.
meanings.sent3: The atok in the balloon made it float effortlessly in the air.
meanings.sent4: The atok in the scuba tank ensures divers can breathe underwater.
meanings.sent5: The atok in the gas cylinder determines its capacity to store fuel.
